name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
ドラゴンブレス,Dragon Breath
[1].自分フィールド上のドラゴンタイプモンスター１体を選択して発動する。相手フィールド上のすべてのモンスターにその攻撃力分のダメージを与える。その後、そのドラゴンタイプモンスターに「このターン攻撃不能」を付与する。,[1]. Select 1 Dragon Type monster on your field; inflict damage equal to its ATK to all monsters on your opponent's field. Then; grant [Cannot Attack (this turn)] to that monster.

name: Gira
mes:
盾の充填,女神盾牌
このカードを場に出した時、デッキから「{%%10069}」を1枚手札に加える。
[1].このカードがフィールド上に存在する限り、自分フィールド上の守備モンスターが受ける戦闘ダメージ・効果ダメージは100ポイント減少する。
[2].このカードが場に出て4ターン以上経過している場合、相手の直接攻撃宣言時に発動できる。手札から「{%%10069}」を特殊召喚し、このカードは自壊する。,[1].這張卡出場時，從牌組將１張「{%%10069}」加入手牌。
[2].當這張卡在場上時，自己場上守備怪獸的怪獸受到的戰鬥・效果傷害減少100點。
[3].這張卡出場算起經過４回合後，可以在對手對玩家進行攻擊宣言時發動。特殊召喚１張手牌的「{%%10069}」，這張卡自爆。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
盾の充填,Shield Charge
When this card is played; add 1 "{%%10069}" from your Deck to your hand.\n[1]. While this card remains on the field; reduce battle and effect damage to Defense Position monsters you control by 100 points.\n[2]. If this card has been on the field for 4 or more turns; you may activate it during an opponent's direct attack declaration. Special Summon 1 "{%%10069}" from your hand and this card self-destructs.
swipes:
盾の充填,Shield Charge
When this card is played; add 1 [{%%10069}] from your Deck to your hand.\n[1]. As long as this card remains on the field; reduce any battle and effect damage taken by Defense Position monsters you control by 100 points.\n[2]. If this card has been on the field for 4 or more turns; when an opponent declares a direct attack, you may Special Summon 1 [{%%10069}] from your hand, and then this card will destroy itself.

盾の充填,Shield Charge
When this card is played; add 1 "{%%10069}" from your Deck to your hand.\n[1]. While this card remains on the field; reduce battle and effect damage to Defense Position monsters you control by 100 points.\n[2]. If this card has been on the field for 4 or more turns; you may activate it during an opponent's direct attack declaration. Special Summon 1 "{%%10069}" from your hand and this card self-destructs.
